title: Pharmacokinetic properties of wogonin and its herb-drug interactions with docetaxel in rats with mammary tumors - PubMed
author: Username
description: Docetaxel, frequently used for the treatment of breast cancer, is mainly metabolized via hepatic cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A in humans and is also a substrate of P-glycoprotein (P-gp). Wogonin has been shown to be able to modulate the activities of CYPs and P-gp, and it could serve as an adjuvant chemo ...
